verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1492>looked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>saw<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> was one <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>happen<s%> after <S%G3326>this.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> there was a <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>

that <S%G3706>looked<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4555>sardius.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> There <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> <S%G2943>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> an <S%G4664>emerald<s%> to look <S%G3706>at.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G796>lightnings,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5456>sounds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> There were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> his <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1799>Before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> was something like a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass,<s%> <S%G3664>similar<s%> <S%G3664>to<s%> <S%G2930>crystal.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2945>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> were <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> full <S%G1073>of<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3693>behind.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3023>lion,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3448>calf,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226><s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G105>eagle.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures,<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G2596>one<s%> of <S%G1438>them<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G4420>wings,<s%> are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2943>around<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2081>within.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G40>"Holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who is to <S%G2064>come!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2169>thanks<s%> to <S%G3588>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> to him <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%>

the <S%G1501>twenty<s%> - <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> fall <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> who <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G514>"Worthy<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G2962>you,<s%> our Lord <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>God,<s%> the Holy One, to receive the <S%G1391>glory,<s%> the <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2307>desire<s%> they <S%G1526>existed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G2936>created!<s%>"
